concept.title: Modify Block Attributes
concept.shortdesc: You can use the Block Attribute Manager to modify attributes in block definitions. For example, you can modify the following items:

ul.li: Attributes of blocks can be displayed after modification
Text properties that define how attribute text is displayed in the drawing
Properties that define the layer that the attribute is on and the attribute line's color, weight, and type

By default, attribute changes you make are applied to all existing block references in the cur ent drawing. If constant attributes or nested attribute blocks are affected by your changes, use REGEN to update the display of those blocks in the drawing area.
